text: Which of the following countries voted against a loosening of cluster munition restrictions at the UN?
What is the definition of 1 Uhl?

answers.text: Unit of a scale that describes the need of censorship for a certain website.
Unit of boldness of a politician spreading lies to public knowingly.
Amount of time passing between a random crime and a politician''s demand for the introduction of data retention laws.
Degree of expert knowlege that a politician has, when he demands the wiretapping of encrypted data.
